title: Getting Started with Cloud Architecture: A Deep Dive into Modern Infrastructure and Deployment Strategies
description: We explore the fundamentals of cloud architecture with our first guest, covering everything from containers to serverless.
showNotes: In this episode, we discuss cloud-native design patterns, container orchestration, and the trade-offs between different deployment models. Topics include Docker, Kubernetes, and serverless functions.

title: Design Systems That Scale
description: How to build and maintain a design system that grows with your team and product.
showNotes: We cover component libraries, design tokens, accessibility standards, and how to get buy-in from engineering and design teams alike.

title: The Art of Developer Experience
description: What makes a great developer experience? We break down tooling, documentation, and API design.
showNotes: Topics include CLI design, SDK ergonomics, documentation-driven development, and measuring developer satisfaction. We also touch on open-source community building.

title: Solo Episode: Lessons from a Year of Podcasting
description: A solo reflection on what we have learned after a year of conversations with incredible guests.
showNotes: Shayne reflects on the top takeaways from the first year, listener feedback, and what is coming next for the show.

title: Open Source Sustainability
description: How do open-source maintainers keep projects alive? We talk funding, burnout, and community.
showNotes: A frank conversation about the economics of open source, sponsorship models, and how companies can better support the projects they depend on.
